title: Amazon’s AWS Shows Signs of Weakness as Competitors Charge Ahead
description: The company that invented the cloud business is widely perceived as trailing its rivals in artificial intelligence.

title: Fast-Money Quants Stumble as Momentum Bust Roils Strategies
description: Behind the scenes of placid Wall Street markets, drama is unfolding for some heavy-hitting professional investors.

title: Intel Earnings Signal Possible Comeback | Bloomberg Tech 10/24/2025
description: Bloomberg’s Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow discuss Intel’s earnings, as the chipmaker returned to profitability and gave an upbeat revenue forecast. Plus, banks are preparing to launch a $38 billion debt offering to help fund data centers tied to Oracle. That comes as the Bank of England begins to probe data center lending amid fears of an AI bubble. And, Mistral CEO Arthur Mensch discusses the company's release of a new platform to help enterprise clients make customizable AI tools. (Source: Bloomberg)
